title: My father (Wali, Guardian) is in my hometown, what to do if I want to get married? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: in short khadijah says she doesn't have a guardian and she lives in germany your guardian khadija is back in yemen so get a written authorization from your father that he authorizes brother abdullah al-mani who is the head of the islamic center where you live and he will be your wali he can organize the meetings with between you and a potential uh spouse so that you can speak to him and see him and he sees you for the first interview and then conducts the marriage in sha allah
